sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { FaMapMarkerAlt, FaCalendarDay, FaMale, FaPlus } from 'react-icons/fa'
import { useQuery } from 'react-query'

import { fetchCities } from '../../api/cities'
import { InputForm } from '../../components/inputForm'
import {
  AddButton,
  AddButtonContainer,
  CardBody,
  CardContainer,
  CardForm,
  CardFormInputs,
  CardHeader,
  CardTitle,
  MoreInputContainer,
  SearchButton,
  SectionSearch,
} from './styles'

export const Home: React.FC = () => {
  const [extraFields, setExtraFields] = React.useState<Array<number>>([])

  const handleAddNewFormField = (): void => {
    setExtraFields([...extraFields, extraFields.length + 1])
  }

  return (
    <SectionSearch>
      <CardContainer>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle>Trip</CardTitle>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardBody>
          <CardForm>
            <CardFormInputs>
              <InputForm
                type='text'
                name='origin'
                label='City of origin'
                icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
              />

              <InputForm
                type='text'
                name='destiny'
                label='City of destination'
                icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
              />

              <InputForm
                type='text'
                name='trip-date'
                label='Date of the trip'
                icon={<FaCalendarDay size={24} />}
              />

              <InputForm
                type='number'
                name='passengers'
                label='Number of passengers'
                icon={<FaMale size={24} />}
              />
            </CardFormInputs>

            <MoreInputContainer>
              {extraFields.map((field) => (
                <InputForm
                  key={field}
                  type='text'
                  name={`intermediate-city-${field}`}
                  label='Intermediate city'
                  icon={<FaMapMarkerAlt size={24} />}
                />
              ))}
            </MoreInputContainer>

            <AddButtonContainer>
              <AddButton type='button' onClick={handleAddNewFormField}>
                <FaPlus size={12} />
                Add intermediate city
              </AddButton>
            </AddButtonContainer>
            <SearchButton type='button'>Search</SearchButton>
          </CardForm>
        </CardBody>
      </CardContainer>
    </SectionSearch>
  )
}
